item.description: Trailhead: Take I93 north to exit 28,make a right onto NH49 toward Waterville Valley,when just getting to Waterville Valley,make a left onto Tripoli Road at the sign flashing how fast you are going.Stay to the right on Tripoli Road,do not go to the ski area,park in the Osceola Trail Parking Lot.The group will be hiking the Mount Osceola Trail to the summit of Mount Osceola(4340').Excellent views from the summit ledge. 6.4 miles round trip,2050' elevation gain,AMC book time 4 hours,7 hours estimated time for our group.No dogs.-----Steve-----As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release,hold harmless,and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage,injury,illness and/or death,including those caused by negligence and or other reasons.You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: MODERATE / STRENUOUS HIKE-MOUNT OSCEOLA
